item.title: Listing Dependencies of Packages
item.description: There is a fantastic tool in the Go eco system called go list. This tool uses Go template package and comes with comes a set of predefined template variables we can use to format its output. Here we will use it to list the dependencies of our local package. Lets assume we are working on html scrapping package called scrappy Listing all packages $ go list -f '{{ .Imports }}' github.
